name: Fairest Forest
description:
For the Shakespeare Game Exhibition in Aotea Square, Auckland, AUT Digital Design students were tasked with creating a game based off Shakespeare's plays. This game is based off A Midsummer Night's Dream. In groups of 3-4, we creating our first 3D game with Unity.

Note: depending on the computer you have and ram space, the game may lag.

More can be read about this game including development, screen shots, cutscenes on my blog!

Please enjoy!!
